Text: Real-world motivations: 1. Receive_Application first: Ensures that the process starts with a customer application. 2. Preliminary_Credit_Check after Receive_Application: Helps assess the applicants creditworthiness early to avoid wasting time on unqualified applicants. 3. Gather_Additional_Documents after Preliminary_Credit_Check: Ensures that documents are collected only after initial credit approval. 4. Quality_Assurance_Review before Authorize_Contract_Terms: Ensures that the loan package is compliant and correct before final approval.

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - PE
Text: Consequences of violating constraints: - If Preliminary_Credit_Check is skipped, the bank might approve uncreditworthy applicants. - If Gather_Additional_Documents happens before Preliminary_Credit_Check, the bank might collect unnecessary documents from unqualified applicants. - If Quality_Assurance_Review is skipped, the loan package might be non-compliant or contain errors. - If funds are transferred before authorization or notification, it could lead to fraud or customer dissatisfaction. - If Notify_Customer happens before Transfer_Funds, the customer might be misled about the availability of funds.
